sub_title: Inspirational Leader | Change Agent | Bridge-builder | Social Justice Advocate
summary:
Visionary, culturally aware, diplomatic leader with proven track record of developing, translating and aligning strategy with organization vision and goals; building internal and external coalitions and consensus at all levels in complex matrixed-managed international organizations; driving transformational change resulting in long-term financial and operational sustainability and growth.

IFRC-trained partnerships and resource development expert with 15+ years’ in the international development sector, successfully developing effective donor cultivation strategies; preparing winning proposals; mobilizing high-value grants from institutional donors, UN, governments, philanthropic foundations and corporations.

Social justice advocate, passionate about fighting for the rights of women, children, vulnerable and the environment and fostering organizational cultures of gender-equality, diversity, inclusivity, transparency and accountability.

STRATEGIC OPERATIONAL & PROGRAMMATIC CONTRIBUTIONS

•	Visioning and Strategic Leadership 
Led the strategic change of Crime Stoppers International (CSI) from being a volunteer-run US-centric non-profit to a professional Foundation registered in the Netherlands (2016) resulting in strengthened relationships with key stakeholders, greater visibility, political influence, and increased funding. Set up and oversee registration of 9 country offices in various regions.

•	Change Management Strategy and Execution
Drove organizational change, utilized various methodologies to measure cultural attributes and change readiness; forward scanned to identify risks and anticipate points of resistance; built internal change networks to coach and help lead change; implemented governance framework and used creative communications and engagement tools to maintain staff morale and embed a culture of efficiency.

•	Fundraising and Business Development Strategies
Principal representative and liaison with partners and donors including Interpol, Europol, UN, WWF, IATA, CNN; initiated, negotiated, and managed global cooperation agreements and Memoranda of Understanding; built partnerships and secured high-value commitments from global corporations.

•	Programme and project management
Designed, co-created and managed multiple programs covering thematic areas of HIV & STI education/prevention/testing/care, road safety education/prevention, community safety, WASH.
------------------------------------------------------------------------
Trinidad & Tobago Passport Holder with the right to live and work in EU
Contact at devroldupignycsi@gmail.com
